Controller - Class in <Unnamed>

stores controller (only accessible when start method runs)

Share encoder params to create decoder
createDecoder(byte[]) - Method in class Messenger
Wrapper function for Security class, allows secure pass through of security information

Last step in diffie-hellman protocol, take cipher params to create a decoder
createPub(byte[], CommunicationInterface) - Method in interface CommunicationInterface
Create a public key to otherPub spec
createPub(byte[], CommunicationInterface) - Method in class Messenger
Wrapper function for Security class, allows secure pass through of security information
createPub(byte[], CommunicationInterface) - Method in class Security
Second step in diffie-hellman protocol, take a public key and generate our own, send to the other party to create a shared secret
createSharedSecret(CommunicationInterface) - Method in class Security
First step in diffie-hellman protocol, generate public key and send to other party

share(byte[], byte[]) - Method in class Security
